pr_title: Wait for jobs to complete when resolving the classpaths

timeline.bodyText: That's too broad. You'll wait for unrelated jobs to finish
timeline.author: fbricon

replies.author: jdneo

replies.bodyText: I don't think you need to wait for build jobs. During a build all the classpaths are supposed to have been set already, so building projects won't change anything to that
replies.author: fbricon
jdneo

replies.bodyText: Just add more background here: The cases might fail with a very high possibility after BuildPathManager#mavenProjectChanged(), where the SetContainerOperation will be triggered.
replies.author: jdneo
snjeza
